description:
Landmarks Lite: New York is a free version of ‘Landmarks: New York’ that lists the official landmarked buildings & sites by name and neighborhood in New York’s five boroughs.

*** UPGRADE to the FULL VERSION of the app so you can search for landmarks near you (based on your phone’s location, and you set the distance you want to search), and by address anywhere in New York City.  The full version also has the latest listing of landmarks (the lite version is only current through Oct. 2010). ***

Both versions tell you when each landmark was first designated, provides information from the Landmarks Preservation Commission such as LP number and if it’s in a Historic District, and provides a link to Wikipedia. You can view the location on a map, and email details about the landmark with just a single tap. 

Feedback and suggestions are greatly appreciated!
